HomePage.yourAppIsReadyToExplore: Your app is ready to explore! It contains everything you need to get started including the <PolarisLink>Polaris design system</PolarisLink>, <AdminApiLink>Shopify Admin API</AdminApiLink>, and <AppBridgeLink>App Bridge</AppBridgeLink> UI library and components.

CustomizeInventoryStatus.title: Customize Inventory Status ðŸ’¡
CustomizeInventoryStatus.discription: The inventory status in our app allows you to personalize and display custom messages for different inventory statuses on your store.
CustomizeInventoryStatus.step1-1: Activate the inventory status on the Inventory Status Setting page.
CustomizeInventoryStatus.step1-2: You can input your desired custom inventory status messages.
CustomizeInventoryStatus.step2-1: Add our app block to your preferred section on the theme customization page of your Shopify admin panel.
CustomizeInventoryStatus.message2: That's it! With our custom inventory status, you can enhance the shopping experience for your customers by providing clear and personalized messages.
